title: AWS Step Functions to Amazon EMR Serverless
description: This pattern has a AWS Step Functions State Machine which will provide a workflow with the capability to run a job on Amazon EMR Serverless. It provisions all the required resources using Terraform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
